The protocol specification for ae daemon and clients

=AE-DAEMON / CLIENTS PROTOCOL SPECIFICATION=

====Notification Format (should be a fixed size to make it easier)====
|| *Field* || *Size* || *Description* ||
|| Magic Number || 4 char || CTRL-T, CTRL-B, CTRL-R, CTRL-T ||
|| Version || 2 char || Major, Minor ||
|| Timestamp || 1 long || Seconds from epoch ||
|| Nonce || 1 long || Incrementing number. Random start value ||
|| Signature || TBD || TBD ||
|| Source Alias || 16 char || ||
|| Monitor ID || TBD || TBD ||
|| Event ID || 1 int || Set the bits in an integer ||
|| Event Type || 1 int || Set the bits in an integer ||
|| Event Details || 100 char || Fixed 80 bytes (filename, etc) ||
|| Possible Actions || 1 int || Set the bits in an integer ||
|| Magic Number || 4 char || CTR-t, CTRL-b, CTRL-r, CTRL-t ||

====Response Format (should be a fixed size to make it easier)====
|| *Field* || *Size* || *Description* ||
|| Magic Number || 4 char || CTRL-T, CTRL-B, CTRL-R, CTRL-T ||
|| Version || 2 char || Major, Minor ||
|| Timestamp || 1 long | Seconds from epoch ||
|| Nonce || 1 long || Incrementing number. Random start value ||
|| Signature || TBD || TBD ||
|| Destination Alias || 16 char || ||
|| Monitor ID || TBD || TBD ||
|| Event ID || 1 int || Set the bits in an integer ||
|| Event Type || 1 int || Set the bits in an integer ||
|| Action to take || 1 int|| Set the bits in an integer ||
|| Magic Number || 4 char || CTR-t, CTRL-b, CTRL-r, CTRL-t ||
